ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a Sr. Java Developer at HCL Technologies Limited. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Java Server Pages, Java, Hibernate, ECLiPSe, XML, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, Struts Web Application Framework, JavaScript, Java Servlets, Spring Framework, Interwoven, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, MVC, JDBC, HTML, Enterprise Java Beans, Apache Subversion, AJAX, UNIX, SQL, Oracle, Java Messaging Service, jQuery, Sun Solaris, Service Oriented Architecture, Rapid Application Development RAD, Perl Programming, Oracle PL/SQL, OpenDeploy, Linux, Java Swing, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, JUnit, JIRA, Cascading Style Sheets, CVS, Ant, XSLT, Web Services, Regression Testing, Log4j, IBM WebSphere, CGI Web Development, XSL, WIS, Unit, TOAD, Symantec, Sybase, Site Publisher, Remedy, Pmsmart, Oracle CRM, Oracle 10G, Lotus Notes/Domino, Jboss, Java 2, JBoss Java EE application server, JAD, Database Design, Data Access Object, Class Diagrams, Advanced RISC Machine (ARM). So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
